casebody.data:
R. BLACKINGTON & CO. v. ADELS. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 3, 1922.) No. 267. Emery, Varney, Blair & Hoguet, of New York City (Robert S. Blair, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Otto Munk, of New York City (George N. Goddard, of Boston, Mass., of counsel), for appellees.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
